03818 
03819 static const struct dt_object_operations osd_obj_otable_it_ops = {
03820         .do_attr_get    = osd_otable_it_attr_get,
03821         .do_index_try   = osd_index_try,
03822 };
03823 
03824 static int osd_index_declare_iam_delete(const struct lu_env *env,
03825                                         struct dt_object *dt,
03826                                         const struct dt_key *key,
03827                                         struct thandle *handle)
03828 {
03829         struct osd_thandle    *oh;
03830 
03831         oh = container_of0(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
03832         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle == NULL);
03833 
03834         /* Recycle  may cause additional three blocks to be changed. */
03835         osd_trans_declare_op(env, oh, OSD_OT_DELETE,
03836                              osd_dto_credits_noquota[DTO_INDEX_DELETE] + 3);
03837 
03838         return 0;
03839 }
03840 
03852 static int osd_index_iam_delete(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
03853                                 const struct dt_key *key,
03854                                 struct thandle *handle)
03855 {
03856         struct osd_thread_info *oti = osd_oti_get(env);
03857         struct osd_object      *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
03858         struct osd_thandle     *oh;
03859         struct iam_path_descr  *ipd;
03860         struct iam_container   *bag = &obj->oo_dir->od_container;
03861         int                     rc;
03862         ENTRY;
03863 
03864         if (!dt_object_exists(dt))
03865                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
03866 
03867         LINVRNT(osd_invariant(obj));
03868         LASSERT(!dt_object_remote(dt));
03869         LASSERT(bag->ic_object == obj->oo_inode);
03870         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
03871 
03872         osd_trans_exec_op(env, handle, OSD_OT_DELETE);
03873 
03874         ipd = osd_idx_ipd_get(env, bag);
03875         if (unlikely(ipd == NULL))
03876                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
03877 
03878         oh = container_of0(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
03879         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle != NULL);
03880         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle->h_transaction != NULL);
03881 
03882         if (fid_is_quota(lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu))) {
03883                 /* swab quota uid/gid provided by caller */
03884                 oti->oti_quota_id = cpu_to_le64(*((__u64 *)key));
03885                 key = (const struct dt_key *)&oti->oti_quota_id;
03886         }
03887 
03888         rc = iam_delete(oh->ot_handle, bag, (const struct iam_key *)key, ipd);
03889         osd_ipd_put(env, bag, ipd);
03890         LINVRNT(osd_invariant(obj));
03891         osd_trans_exec_check(env, handle, OSD_OT_DELETE);
03892         RETURN(rc);
03893 }
03894 
03895 static int osd_index_declare_ea_delete(const struct lu_env *env,
03896                                        struct dt_object *dt,
03897                                        const struct dt_key *key,
03898                                        struct thandle *handle)
03899 {
03900         struct osd_thandle *oh;
03901         struct inode       *inode;
03902         int                 rc;
03903         ENTRY;
03904 
03905         LASSERT(!dt_object_remote(dt));
03906         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
03907 
03908         oh = container_of0(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
03909         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle == NULL);
03910 
03911         /* due to DNE we may need to remove an agent inode */
03912         osd_trans_declare_op(env, oh, OSD_OT_DELETE,
03913                              osd_dto_credits_noquota[DTO_INDEX_DELETE] +
03914                              osd_dto_credits_noquota[DTO_OBJECT_DELETE]);
03915 
03916         inode = osd_dt_obj(dt)->oo_inode;
03917         if (inode == NULL)
03918                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
03919 
03920         rc = osd_declare_inode_qid(env, i_uid_read(inode), i_gid_read(inode),
03921                                    0, oh, osd_dt_obj(dt), true, NULL, false);
03922         RETURN(rc);
03923 }
03924 
03925 static inline int osd_get_fid_from_dentry(struct ldiskfs_dir_entry_2 *de,
03926                                           struct dt_rec *fid)
03927 {
03928         struct osd_fid_pack *rec;
03929         int                  rc = -ENODATA;
03930 
03931         if (de->file_type & LDISKFS_DIRENT_LUFID) {
03932                 rec = (struct osd_fid_pack *) (de->name + de->name_len + 1);
03933                 rc = osd_fid_unpack((struct lu_fid *)fid, rec);
03934                 if (rc == 0 && unlikely(!fid_is_sane((struct lu_fid *)fid)))
03935                         rc = -EINVAL;
03936         }
03937         return rc;
03938 }
03939 
03940 static int osd_remote_fid(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_device *osd,
03941                           const struct lu_fid *fid)
03942 {
03943         struct seq_server_site  *ss = osd_seq_site(osd);
03944         ENTRY;
03945 
03946         /* FID seqs not in FLDB, must be local seq */
03947         if (unlikely(!fid_seq_in_fldb(fid_seq(fid))))
03948                 RETURN(0);
03949 
03950         /* If FLD is not being initialized yet, it only happens during the
03951          * initialization, likely during mgs initialization, and we assume
03952          * this is local FID. */
03953         if (ss == NULL || ss->ss_server_fld == NULL)
03954                 RETURN(0);
03955 
03956         /* Only check the local FLDB here */
03957         if (osd_seq_exists(env, osd, fid_seq(fid)))
03958                 RETURN(0);
03959 
03960         RETURN(1);
03961 }
03962 
03973 static int osd_index_ea_delete(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
03974                                const struct dt_key *key, struct thandle *handle)
03975 {
03976         struct osd_object          *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
03977         struct inode               *dir = obj->oo_inode;
03978         struct dentry              *dentry;
03979         struct osd_thandle         *oh;
03980         struct ldiskfs_dir_entry_2 *de = NULL;
03981         struct buffer_head         *bh;
03982         struct htree_lock          *hlock = NULL;
03983         struct lu_fid              *fid = &osd_oti_get(env)->oti_fid;
03984         struct osd_device          *osd = osd_dev(dt->do_lu.lo_dev);
03985         int                        rc;
03986         ENTRY;
03987 
03988         if (!dt_object_exists(dt))
03989                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
03990 
03991         LINVRNT(osd_invariant(obj));
03992         LASSERT(!dt_object_remote(dt));
03993         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
03994 
03995         osd_trans_exec_op(env, handle, OSD_OT_DELETE);
03996 
03997         oh = container_of(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
03998         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle != NULL);
03999         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle->h_transaction != NULL);
04000 
04001         ll_vfs_dq_init(dir);
04002         dentry = osd_child_dentry_get(env, obj,
04003                                       (char *)key, strlen((char *)key));
04004 
04005         if (obj->oo_hl_head != NULL) {
04006                 hlock = osd_oti_get(env)->oti_hlock;
04007                 ldiskfs_htree_lock(hlock, obj->oo_hl_head,
04008                                    dir, LDISKFS_HLOCK_DEL);
04009         } else {
04010                 down_write(&obj->oo_ext_idx_sem);
04011         }
04012 
04013         bh = osd_ldiskfs_find_entry(dir, &dentry->d_name, &de, NULL, hlock);
04014         if (bh) {
04015                 /* If this is not the ".." entry, it might be a remote DNE
04016                  * entry and  we need to check if the FID is for a remote
04017                  * MDT.  If the FID is  not in the directory entry (e.g.
04018                  * upgraded 1.8 filesystem without dirdata enabled) then
04019                  * we need to get the FID from the LMA. For a remote directory
04020                  * there HAS to be an LMA, it cannot be an IGIF inode in this
04021                  * case.
04022                  *
04023                  * Delete the entry before the agent inode in order to
04024                  * simplify error handling.  At worst an error after deleting
04025                  * the entry first might leak the agent inode afterward. The
04026                  * reverse would need filesystem abort in case of error deleting
04027                  * the entry after the agent had been removed, or leave a
04028                  * dangling entry pointing at a random inode. */
04029                 if (strcmp((char *)key, dotdot) != 0) {
04030                         LASSERT(de != NULL);
04031                         rc = osd_get_fid_from_dentry(de, (struct dt_rec *)fid);
04032                         if (rc == -ENODATA) {
04033                                 /* can't get FID, postpone to the end of the
04034                                  * transaction when iget() is safe */
04035                                 osd_schedule_agent_inode_removal(env, oh,
04036                                                 le32_to_cpu(de->inode));
04037                         } else if (rc == 0 &&
04038                                    unlikely(osd_remote_fid(env, osd, fid))) {
04039                                 osd_schedule_agent_inode_removal(env, oh,
04040                                                 le32_to_cpu(de->inode));
04041                         }
04042                 }
04043                 rc = ldiskfs_delete_entry(oh->ot_handle, dir, de, bh);
04044                 brelse(bh);
04045         } else {
04046                 rc = -ENOENT;
04047         }
04048         if (hlock != NULL)
04049                 ldiskfs_htree_unlock(hlock);
04050         else
04051                 up_write(&obj->oo_ext_idx_sem);
04052 
04053         if (rc != 0)
04054                 GOTO(out, rc);
04055 
04056         /* For inode on the remote MDT, .. will point to
04057          * /Agent directory, Check whether it needs to delete
04058          * from agent directory */
04059         if (unlikely(strcmp((char *)key, dotdot) == 0)) {
04060                 rc = osd_delete_from_remote_parent(env, osd_obj2dev(obj), obj,
04061                                                    oh);
04062                 if (rc != 0 && rc != -ENOENT) {
04063                         CERROR("%s: delete agent inode "DFID": rc = %d\n",
04064                                osd_name(osd), PFID(fid), rc);
04065                 }
04066 
04067                 if (rc == -ENOENT)
04068                         rc = 0;
04069 
04070                 GOTO(out, rc);
04071         }
04072 out:
04073 
04074         LASSERT(osd_invariant(obj));
04075         osd_trans_exec_check(env, handle, OSD_OT_DELETE);
04076         RETURN(rc);
04077 }
04078 
04090 static int osd_index_iam_lookup(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
04091                                 struct dt_rec *rec, const struct dt_key *key)
04092 {
04093         struct osd_object      *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
04094         struct iam_path_descr  *ipd;
04095         struct iam_container   *bag = &obj->oo_dir->od_container;
04096         struct osd_thread_info *oti = osd_oti_get(env);
04097         struct iam_iterator    *it = &oti->oti_idx_it;
04098         struct iam_rec         *iam_rec;
04099         int                     rc;
04100         ENTRY;
04101 
04102         if (!dt_object_exists(dt))
04103                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
04104 
04105         LASSERT(osd_invariant(obj));
04106         LASSERT(!dt_object_remote(dt));
04107         LASSERT(bag->ic_object == obj->oo_inode);
04108 
04109         ipd = osd_idx_ipd_get(env, bag);
04110         if (IS_ERR(ipd))
04111                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
04112 
04113         /* got ipd now we can start iterator. */
04114         iam_it_init(it, bag, 0, ipd);
04115 
04116         if (fid_is_quota(lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu))) {
04117                 /* swab quota uid/gid provided by caller */
04118                 oti->oti_quota_id = cpu_to_le64(*((__u64 *)key));
04119                 key = (const struct dt_key *)&oti->oti_quota_id;
04120         }
04121 
04122         rc = iam_it_get(it, (struct iam_key *)key);
04123         if (rc >= 0) {
04124                 if (S_ISDIR(obj->oo_inode->i_mode))
04125                         iam_rec = (struct iam_rec *)oti->oti_ldp;
04126                 else
04127                         iam_rec = (struct iam_rec *) rec;
04128 
04129                 iam_reccpy(&it->ii_path.ip_leaf, (struct iam_rec *)iam_rec);
04130 
04131                 if (S_ISDIR(obj->oo_inode->i_mode))
04132                         osd_fid_unpack((struct lu_fid *) rec,
04133                                        (struct osd_fid_pack *)iam_rec);
04134                 else if (fid_is_quota(lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu)))
04135                         osd_quota_unpack(obj, rec);
04136         }
04137 
04138         iam_it_put(it);
04139         iam_it_fini(it);
04140         osd_ipd_put(env, bag, ipd);
04141 
04142         LINVRNT(osd_invariant(obj));
04143 
04144         RETURN(rc);
04145 }
04146 
04147 static int osd_index_declare_iam_insert(const struct lu_env *env,
04148                                         struct dt_object *dt,
04149                                         const struct dt_rec *rec,
04150                                         const struct dt_key *key,
04151                                         struct thandle *handle)
04152 {
04153         struct osd_thandle *oh;
04154 
04155         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
04156 
04157         oh = container_of0(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
04158         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle == NULL);
04159 
04160         osd_trans_declare_op(env, oh, OSD_OT_INSERT,
04161                              osd_dto_credits_noquota[DTO_INDEX_INSERT]);
04162 
04163         return 0;
04164 }
04165 
04177 static int osd_index_iam_insert(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
04178                                 const struct dt_rec *rec,
04179                                 const struct dt_key *key, struct thandle *th,
04180                                 int ignore_quota)
04181 {
04182         struct osd_object     *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
04183         struct iam_path_descr *ipd;
04184         struct osd_thandle    *oh;
04185         struct iam_container  *bag;
04186         struct osd_thread_info *oti = osd_oti_get(env);
04187         struct iam_rec         *iam_rec;
04188         int                     rc;
04189         ENTRY;
04190 
04191         if (!dt_object_exists(dt))
04192                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
04193 
04194         LINVRNT(osd_invariant(obj));
04195         LASSERT(!dt_object_remote(dt));
04196 
04197         bag = &obj->oo_dir->od_container;
04198         LASSERT(bag->ic_object == obj->oo_inode);
04199         LASSERT(th != NULL);
04200 
04201         osd_trans_exec_op(env, th, OSD_OT_INSERT);
04202 
04203         ipd = osd_idx_ipd_get(env, bag);
04204         if (unlikely(ipd == NULL))
04205                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
04206 
04207         oh = container_of0(th, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
04208         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle != NULL);
04209         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle->h_transaction != NULL);
04210         if (S_ISDIR(obj->oo_inode->i_mode)) {
04211                 iam_rec = (struct iam_rec *)oti->oti_ldp;
04212                 osd_fid_pack((struct osd_fid_pack *)iam_rec, rec, &oti->oti_fid);
04213         } else if (fid_is_quota(lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu))) {
04214                 /* pack quota uid/gid */
04215                 oti->oti_quota_id = cpu_to_le64(*((__u64 *)key));
04216                 key = (const struct dt_key *)&oti->oti_quota_id;
04217                 /* pack quota record */
04218                 rec = osd_quota_pack(obj, rec, &oti->oti_quota_rec);
04219                 iam_rec = (struct iam_rec *)rec;
04220         } else {
04221                 iam_rec = (struct iam_rec *)rec;
04222         }
04223 
04224         rc = iam_insert(oh->ot_handle, bag, (const struct iam_key *)key,
04225                         iam_rec, ipd);
04226         osd_ipd_put(env, bag, ipd);
04227         LINVRNT(osd_invariant(obj));
04228         osd_trans_exec_check(env, th, OSD_OT_INSERT);
04229         RETURN(rc);
04230 }
04231 
04240 static int __osd_ea_add_rec(struct osd_thread_info *info,
04241                             struct osd_object *pobj, struct inode  *cinode,
04242                             const char *name, const struct lu_fid *fid,
04243                             struct htree_lock *hlock, struct thandle *th)
04244 {
04245         struct ldiskfs_dentry_param *ldp;
04246         struct dentry               *child;
04247         struct osd_thandle          *oth;
04248         int                          rc;
04249 
04250         oth = container_of(th, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
04251         LASSERT(oth->ot_handle != NULL);
04252         LASSERT(oth->ot_handle->h_transaction != NULL);
04253         LASSERT(pobj->oo_inode);
04254 
04255         ldp = (struct ldiskfs_dentry_param *)info->oti_ldp;
04256         if (unlikely(pobj->oo_inode ==
04257                      osd_sb(osd_obj2dev(pobj))->s_root->d_inode))
04258                 ldp->edp_magic = 0;
04259         else
04260                 osd_get_ldiskfs_dirent_param(ldp, fid);
04261         child = osd_child_dentry_get(info->oti_env, pobj, name, strlen(name));
04262         child->d_fsdata = (void *)ldp;
04263         ll_vfs_dq_init(pobj->oo_inode);
04264         rc = osd_ldiskfs_add_entry(info, oth->ot_handle, child,
04265                                    cinode, hlock);
04266         if (rc == 0 && OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_BAD_TYPE)) {
04267                 struct ldiskfs_dir_entry_2      *de;
04268                 struct buffer_head              *bh;
04269                 int                              rc1;
04270 
04271                 bh = osd_ldiskfs_find_entry(pobj->oo_inode, &child->d_name, &de,
04272                                             NULL, hlock);
04273                 if (bh != NULL) {
04274                         rc1 = ldiskfs_journal_get_write_access(oth->ot_handle,
04275                                                                bh);
04276                         if (rc1 == 0) {
04277                                 if (S_ISDIR(cinode->i_mode))
04278                                         de->file_type = LDISKFS_DIRENT_LUFID |
04279                                                         LDISKFS_FT_REG_FILE;
04280                                 else
04281                                         de->file_type = LDISKFS_DIRENT_LUFID |
04282                                                         LDISKFS_FT_DIR;
04283                                 ldiskfs_handle_dirty_metadata(oth->ot_handle,
04284                                                               NULL, bh);
04285                                 brelse(bh);
04286                         }
04287                 }
04288         }
04289 
04290         RETURN(rc);
04291 }
04292 
04305 static int osd_add_dot_dotdot(struct osd_thread_info *info,
04306                               struct osd_object *dir,
04307                               struct inode *parent_dir, const char *name,
04308                               const struct lu_fid *dot_fid,
04309                               const struct lu_fid *dot_dot_fid,
04310                               struct thandle *th)
04311 {
04312         struct inode                *inode = dir->oo_inode;
04313         struct osd_thandle          *oth;
04314         int result = 0;
04315 
04316         oth = container_of(th, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
04317         LASSERT(oth->ot_handle->h_transaction != NULL);
04318         LASSERT(S_ISDIR(dir->oo_inode->i_mode));
04319 
04320         if (strcmp(name, dot) == 0) {
04321                 if (dir->oo_compat_dot_created) {
04322                         result = -EEXIST;
04323                 } else {
04324                         LASSERT(inode->i_ino == parent_dir->i_ino);
04325                         dir->oo_compat_dot_created = 1;
04326                         result = 0;
04327                 }
04328         } else if (strcmp(name, dotdot) == 0) {
04329                 if (!dir->oo_compat_dot_created)
04330                         return -EINVAL;
04331                 /* in case of rename, dotdot is already created */
04332                 if (dir->oo_compat_dotdot_created) {
04333                         return __osd_ea_add_rec(info, dir, parent_dir, name,
04334                                                 dot_dot_fid, NULL, th);
04335                 }
04336 
04337                 if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_BAD_PARENT)) {
04338                         struct lu_fid tfid = *dot_dot_fid;
04339 
04340                         tfid.f_oid--;
04341                         result = osd_add_dot_dotdot_internal(info,
04342                                         dir->oo_inode, parent_dir, dot_fid,
04343                                         &tfid, oth);
04344                 } else {
04345                         result = osd_add_dot_dotdot_internal(info,
04346                                         dir->oo_inode, parent_dir, dot_fid,
04347                                         dot_dot_fid, oth);
04348                 }
04349 
04350                 if (result == 0)
04351                         dir->oo_compat_dotdot_created = 1;
04352         }
04353 
04354         return result;
04355 }
04356 
04357 
04362 static int osd_ea_add_rec(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *pobj,
04363                           struct inode *cinode, const char *name,
04364                           const struct lu_fid *fid, struct thandle *th)
04365 {
04366         struct osd_thread_info *info   = osd_oti_get(env);
04367         struct htree_lock      *hlock;
04368         int                     rc;
04369 
04370         hlock = pobj->oo_hl_head != NULL ? info->oti_hlock : NULL;
04371 
04372         if (name[0] == '.' && (name[1] == '\0' || (name[1] == '.' &&
04373                                                    name[2] =='\0'))) {
04374                 if (hlock != NULL) {
04375                         ldiskfs_htree_lock(hlock, pobj->oo_hl_head,
04376                                            pobj->oo_inode, 0);
04377                 } else {
04378                         down_write(&pobj->oo_ext_idx_sem);
04379                 }
04380 
04381                 rc = osd_add_dot_dotdot(info, pobj, cinode, name,
04382                                         lu_object_fid(&pobj->oo_dt.do_lu),
04383                                         fid, th);
04384         } else {
04385                 if (hlock != NULL) {
04386                         ldiskfs_htree_lock(hlock, pobj->oo_hl_head,
04387                                            pobj->oo_inode, LDISKFS_HLOCK_ADD);
04388                 } else {
04389                         down_write(&pobj->oo_ext_idx_sem);
04390                 }
04391 
04392                 if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_FID_INDIR)) {
04393                         struct lu_fid *tfid = &info->oti_fid;
04394 
04395                         *tfid = *fid;
04396                         tfid->f_ver = ~0;
04397                         rc = __osd_ea_add_rec(info, pobj, cinode, name,
04398                                               tfid, hlock, th);
04399                 } else {
04400                         rc = __osd_ea_add_rec(info, pobj, cinode, name, fid,
04401                                               hlock, th);
04402                 }
04403         }
04404         if (hlock != NULL)
04405                 ldiskfs_htree_unlock(hlock);
04406         else
04407                 up_write(&pobj->oo_ext_idx_sem);
04408 
04409         return rc;
04410 }
04411 
04412 static int
04413 osd_consistency_check(struct osd_thread_info *oti, struct osd_device *dev,
04414                       struct osd_idmap_cache *oic)
04415 {
04416         struct osd_scrub    *scrub = &dev->od_scrub;
04417         struct lu_fid       *fid   = &oic->oic_fid;
04418         struct osd_inode_id *id    = &oti->oti_id;
04419         int                  once  = 0;
04420         int                  rc;
04421         ENTRY;
04422 
04423         if (!fid_is_norm(fid) && !fid_is_igif(fid))
04424                 RETURN(0);
04425 
04426         if (scrub->os_pos_current > id->oii_ino)
04427                 RETURN(0);
04428 
04429 again:
04430         rc = osd_oi_lookup(oti, dev, fid, id, 0);
04431         if (rc == -ENOENT) {
04432                 struct inode *inode;
04433 
04434                 *id = oic->oic_lid;
04435                 inode = osd_iget(oti, dev, &oic->oic_lid);
04436 
04437                 /* The inode has been removed (by race maybe). */
04438                 if (IS_ERR(inode)) {
04439                         rc = PTR_ERR(inode);
04440 
04441                         RETURN(rc == -ESTALE ? -ENOENT : rc);
04442                 }
04443 
04444                 iput(inode);
04445                 /* The OI mapping is lost. */
04446                 if (id->oii_gen != OSD_OII_NOGEN)
04447                         goto trigger;
04448 
04449                 /* The inode may has been reused by others, we do not know,
04450                  * leave it to be handled by subsequent osd_fid_lookup(). */
04451                 RETURN(0);
04452         } else if (rc != 0 || osd_id_eq(id, &oic->oic_lid)) {
04453                 RETURN(rc);
04454         }
04455 
04456 trigger:
04457         if (thread_is_running(&scrub->os_thread)) {
04458                 rc = osd_oii_insert(dev, oic, rc == -ENOENT);
04459                 /* There is race condition between osd_oi_lookup and OI scrub.
04460                  * The OI scrub finished just after osd_oi_lookup() failure.
04461                  * Under such case, it is unnecessary to trigger OI scrub again,
04462                  * but try to call osd_oi_lookup() again. */
04463                 if (unlikely(rc == -EAGAIN))
04464                         goto again;
04465 
04466                 RETURN(0);
04467         }
04468 
04469         if (!dev->od_noscrub && ++once == 1) {
04470                 rc = osd_scrub_start(dev, SS_AUTO_PARTIAL | SS_CLEAR_DRYRUN |
04471                                      SS_CLEAR_FAILOUT);
04472                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK | D_CONSOLE, "%.16s: trigger OI scrub by RPC "
04473                        "for "DFID", rc = %d [2]\n",
04474                        LDISKFS_SB(osd_sb(dev))->s_es->s_volume_name,
04475                        PFID(fid), rc);
04476                 if (rc == 0 || rc == -EALREADY)
04477                         goto again;
04478         }
04479 
04480         RETURN(0);
04481 }
04482 
04483 static int osd_fail_fid_lookup(struct osd_thread_info *oti,
04484                                struct osd_device *dev,
04485                                struct osd_idmap_cache *oic,
04486                                struct lu_fid *fid, __u32 ino)
04487 {
04488         struct lustre_mdt_attrs *lma   = &oti->oti_mdt_attrs;
04489         struct inode            *inode;
04490         int                      rc;
04491 
04492         osd_id_gen(&oic->oic_lid, ino, OSD_OII_NOGEN);
04493         inode = osd_iget(oti, dev, &oic->oic_lid);
04494         if (IS_ERR(inode)) {
04495                 fid_zero(&oic->oic_fid);
04496                 return PTR_ERR(inode);
04497         }
04498 
04499         rc = osd_get_lma(oti, inode, &oti->oti_obj_dentry, lma);
04500         iput(inode);
04501         if (rc != 0)
04502                 fid_zero(&oic->oic_fid);
04503         else
04504                 *fid = oic->oic_fid = lma->lma_self_fid;
04505         return rc;
04506 }
04507 
04508 void osd_add_oi_cache(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
04509                       struct osd_inode_id *id, const struct lu_fid *fid)
04510 {
04511         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "add "DFID" %u:%u to info %p\n", PFID(fid),
04512                id->oii_ino, id->oii_gen, info);
04513         info->oti_cache.oic_lid = *id;
04514         info->oti_cache.oic_fid = *fid;
04515         info->oti_cache.oic_dev = osd;
04516 }
04517 
04540 static int osd_get_pfid_from_linkea(const struct lu_env *env,
04541                                     struct osd_object *obj,
04542                                     struct lu_fid *fid)
04543 {
04544         struct osd_thread_info  *oti    = osd_oti_get(env);
04545         struct lu_buf           *buf    = &oti->oti_big_buf;
04546         struct dentry           *dentry = &oti->oti_obj_dentry;
04547         struct inode            *inode  = obj->oo_inode;
04548         struct linkea_data       ldata  = { NULL };
04549         int                      rc;
04550         ENTRY;
04551 
04552         fid_zero(fid);
04553         if (!S_ISDIR(inode->i_mode))
04554                 RETURN(-EIO);
04555 
04556 again:
04557         rc = __osd_xattr_get(inode, dentry, XATTR_NAME_LINK,
04558                              buf->lb_buf, buf->lb_len);
04559         if (rc == -ERANGE) {
04560                 rc = __osd_xattr_get(inode, dentry, XATTR_NAME_LINK,
04561                                      NULL, 0);
04562                 if (rc > 0) {
04563                         lu_buf_realloc(buf, rc);
04564                         if (buf->lb_buf == NULL)
04565                                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
04566 
04567                         goto again;
04568                 }
04569         }
04570 
04571         if (unlikely(rc == 0))
04572                 RETURN(-ENODATA);
04573 
04574         if (rc < 0)
04575                 RETURN(rc);
04576 
04577         if (unlikely(buf->lb_buf == NULL)) {
04578                 lu_buf_realloc(buf, rc);
04579                 if (buf->lb_buf == NULL)
04580                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
04581 
04582                 goto again;
04583         }
04584 
04585         ldata.ld_buf = buf;
04586         rc = linkea_init(&ldata);
04587         if (rc == 0) {
04588                 linkea_first_entry(&ldata);
04589                 linkea_entry_unpack(ldata.ld_lee, &ldata.ld_reclen, NULL, fid);
04590         }
04591 
04592         RETURN(rc);
04593 }
04594 
04603 static int osd_ea_lookup_rec(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_object *obj,
04604                              struct dt_rec *rec, const struct dt_key *key)
04605 {
04606         struct inode                    *dir    = obj->oo_inode;
04607         struct dentry                   *dentry;
04608         struct ldiskfs_dir_entry_2      *de;
04609         struct buffer_head              *bh;
04610         struct lu_fid                   *fid = (struct lu_fid *) rec;
04611         struct htree_lock               *hlock = NULL;
04612         int                             ino;
04613         int                             rc;
04614         ENTRY;
04615 
04616         LASSERT(dir->i_op != NULL);
04617         LASSERT(dir->i_op->lookup != NULL);
04618 
04619         dentry = osd_child_dentry_get(env, obj,
04620                                       (char *)key, strlen((char *)key));
04621 
04622         if (obj->oo_hl_head != NULL) {
04623                 hlock = osd_oti_get(env)->oti_hlock;
04624                 ldiskfs_htree_lock(hlock, obj->oo_hl_head,
04625                                    dir, LDISKFS_HLOCK_LOOKUP);
04626         } else {
04627                 down_read(&obj->oo_ext_idx_sem);
04628         }
04629 
04630         bh = osd_ldiskfs_find_entry(dir, &dentry->d_name, &de, NULL, hlock);
04631         if (bh) {
04632                 struct osd_thread_info *oti = osd_oti_get(env);
04633                 struct osd_inode_id *id = &oti->oti_id;
04634                 struct osd_idmap_cache *oic = &oti->oti_cache;
04635                 struct osd_device *dev = osd_obj2dev(obj);
04636 
04637                 ino = le32_to_cpu(de->inode);
04638                 if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_FID_LOOKUP)) {
04639                         brelse(bh);
04640                         rc = osd_fail_fid_lookup(oti, dev, oic, fid, ino);
04641                         GOTO(out, rc);
04642                 }
04643 
04644                 rc = osd_get_fid_from_dentry(de, rec);
04645 
04646                 /* done with de, release bh */
04647                 brelse(bh);
04648                 if (rc != 0) {
04649                         if (unlikely(ino == osd_remote_parent_ino(dev))) {
04650                                 const char *name = (const char *)key;
04651 
04652                                 /* If the parent is on remote MDT, and there
04653                                  * is no FID-in-dirent, then we have to get
04654                                  * the parent FID from the linkEA.  */
04655                                 if (likely(strlen(name) == 2 &&
04656                                            name[0] == '.' && name[1] == '.'))
04657                                         rc = osd_get_pfid_from_linkea(env, obj,
04658                                                                       fid);
04659                         } else {
04660                                 rc = osd_ea_fid_get(env, obj, ino, fid, id);
04661                         }
04662                 } else {
04663                         osd_id_gen(id, ino, OSD_OII_NOGEN);
04664                 }
04665 
04666                 if (rc != 0 || osd_remote_fid(env, dev, fid)) {
04667                         fid_zero(&oic->oic_fid);
04668 
04669                         GOTO(out, rc);
04670                 }
04671 
04672                 osd_add_oi_cache(osd_oti_get(env), osd_obj2dev(obj), id, fid);
04673                 rc = osd_consistency_check(oti, dev, oic);
04674                 if (rc != 0)
04675                         fid_zero(&oic->oic_fid);
04676         } else {
04677                 rc = -ENOENT;
04678         }
04679 
04680         GOTO(out, rc);
04681 
04682 out:
04683         if (hlock != NULL)
04684                 ldiskfs_htree_unlock(hlock);
04685         else
04686                 up_read(&obj->oo_ext_idx_sem);
04687         return rc;
04688 }
04689 
04695 static inline void osd_object_put(const struct lu_env *env,
04696                                   struct osd_object *obj)
04697 {
04698         lu_object_put(env, &obj->oo_dt.do_lu);
04699 }
04700 
04701 static int osd_index_declare_ea_insert(const struct lu_env *env,
04702                                        struct dt_object *dt,
04703                                        const struct dt_rec *rec,
04704                                        const struct dt_key *key,
04705                                        struct thandle *handle)
04706 {
04707         struct osd_thandle      *oh;
04708         struct osd_device       *osd   = osd_dev(dt->do_lu.lo_dev);
04709         struct dt_insert_rec    *rec1   = (struct dt_insert_rec *)rec;
04710         const struct lu_fid     *fid    = rec1->rec_fid;
04711         int                      credits, rc = 0;
04712         struct osd_idmap_cache  *idc;
04713         ENTRY;
04714 
04715         LASSERT(!dt_object_remote(dt));
04716         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
04717         LASSERT(fid != NULL);
04718         LASSERT(rec1->rec_type != 0);
04719 
04720         oh = container_of0(handle, struct osd_thandle, ot_super);
04721         LASSERT(oh->ot_handle == NULL);
04722 
04723         credits = osd_dto_credits_noquota[DTO_INDEX_INSERT];
04724 
04725         /* we can't call iget() while a transactions is running
04726          * (this can lead to a deadlock), but we need to know
04727          * inum and object type. so we find this information at
04728          * declaration and cache in per-thread info */
04729         idc = osd_idc_find_or_init(env, osd, fid);
04730         if (IS_ERR(idc))
04731                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(idc));
04732         if (idc->oic_remote) {
04733                 /* a reference to remote inode is represented by an
04734                  * agent inode which we have to create */
04735                 credits += osd_dto_credits_noquota[DTO_OBJECT_CREATE];
04736                 credits += osd_dto_credits_noquota[DTO_INDEX_INSERT];
04737         }
04738 
04739         osd_trans_declare_op(env, oh, OSD_OT_INSERT, credits);
04740 
04741         if (osd_dt_obj(dt)->oo_inode != NULL) {
04742                 struct inode *inode = osd_dt_obj(dt)->oo_inode;
04743 
04744                 /* We ignore block quota on meta pool (MDTs), so needn't
04745                  * calculate how many blocks will be consumed by this index
04746                  * insert */
04747                 rc = osd_declare_inode_qid(env, i_uid_read(inode),
04748                                            i_gid_read(inode), 0, oh,
04749                                            osd_dt_obj(dt), true, NULL, false);
04750         }
04751 
04752         RETURN(rc);
04753 }
04754 
04766 static int osd_index_ea_insert(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
04767                                const struct dt_rec *rec,
04768                                const struct dt_key *key, struct thandle *th,
04769                                int ignore_quota)
04770 {
04771         struct osd_object       *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
04772         struct osd_device       *osd = osd_dev(dt->do_lu.lo_dev);
04773         struct dt_insert_rec    *rec1   = (struct dt_insert_rec *)rec;
04774         const struct lu_fid     *fid    = rec1->rec_fid;
04775         const char              *name = (const char *)key;
04776         struct osd_thread_info  *oti   = osd_oti_get(env);
04777         struct inode            *child_inode = NULL;
04778         struct osd_idmap_cache  *idc;
04779         int                     rc;
04780         ENTRY;
04781 
04782         if (!dt_object_exists(dt))
04783                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
04784 
04785         LASSERT(osd_invariant(obj));
04786         LASSERT(!dt_object_remote(dt));
04787         LASSERT(th != NULL);
04788 
04789         osd_trans_exec_op(env, th, OSD_OT_INSERT);
04790 
04791         LASSERTF(fid_is_sane(fid), "fid"DFID" is insane!\n", PFID(fid));
04792 
04793         idc = osd_idc_find(env, osd, fid);
04794         if (unlikely(idc == NULL)) {
04795                 /* this dt_insert() wasn't declared properly, so
04796                  * FID is missing in OI cache. we better do not
04797                  * lookup FID in FLDB/OI and don't risk to deadlock,
04798                  * but in some special cases (lfsck testing, etc)
04799                  * it's much simpler than fixing a caller */
04800                 CERROR("%s: "DFID" wasn't declared for insert\n",
04801                        osd_name(osd), PFID(fid));
04802                 dump_stack();
04803                 idc = osd_idc_find_or_init(env, osd, fid);
04804                 if (IS_ERR(idc))
04805                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(idc));
04806         }
04807 
04808         if (idc->oic_remote) {
04809                 /* Insert remote entry */
04810                 if (strcmp(name, dotdot) == 0 && strlen(name) == 2) {
04811                         struct osd_mdobj_map    *omm = osd->od_mdt_map;
04812                         struct osd_thandle      *oh;
04813 
04814                         /* If parent on remote MDT, we need put this object
04815                          * under AGENT */
04816                         oh = container_of(th, typeof(*oh), ot_super);
04817                         rc = osd_add_to_remote_parent(env, osd, obj, oh);
04818                         if (rc != 0) {
04819                                 CERROR("%s: add "DFID" error: rc = %d\n",
04820                                        osd_name(osd),
04821                                        PFID(lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu)), rc);
04822                                 RETURN(rc);
04823                         }
04824 
04825                         child_inode = igrab(omm->omm_remote_parent->d_inode);
04826                 } else {
04827                         child_inode = osd_create_local_agent_inode(env, osd,
04828                                         obj, fid, rec1->rec_type & S_IFMT, th);
04829                         if (IS_ERR(child_inode))
04830                                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(child_inode));
04831                 }
04832         } else {
04833                 /* Insert local entry */
04834                 if (unlikely(idc->oic_lid.oii_ino == 0)) {
04835                         /* for a reason OI cache wasn't filled properly */
04836                         CERROR("%s: OIC for "DFID" isn't filled\n",
04837                                osd_name(osd), PFID(fid));
04838                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
04839                 }
04840                 child_inode = oti->oti_inode;
04841                 if (unlikely(child_inode == NULL)) {
04842                         struct ldiskfs_inode_info *lii;
04843                         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lii);
04844                         if (lii == NULL)
04845                                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
04846                         child_inode = oti->oti_inode = &lii->vfs_inode;
04847                 }
04848                 child_inode->i_sb = osd_sb(osd);
04849                 child_inode->i_ino = idc->oic_lid.oii_ino;
04850                 child_inode->i_mode = rec1->rec_type & S_IFMT;
04851         }
04852 
04853         rc = osd_ea_add_rec(env, obj, child_inode, name, fid, th);
04854 
04855         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "parent %lu insert %s:%lu rc = %d\n",
04856                obj->oo_inode->i_ino, name, child_inode->i_ino, rc);
04857 
04858         if (child_inode && child_inode != oti->oti_inode)
04859                 iput(child_inode);
04860         LASSERT(osd_invariant(obj));
04861         osd_trans_exec_check(env, th, OSD_OT_INSERT);
04862         RETURN(rc);
04863 }
04864 
04871 static struct dt_it *osd_it_iam_init(const struct lu_env *env,
04872                                      struct dt_object *dt,
04873                                      __u32 unused)
04874 {
04875         struct osd_it_iam      *it;
04876         struct osd_object      *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
04877         struct lu_object       *lo  = &dt->do_lu;
04878         struct iam_path_descr  *ipd;
04879         struct iam_container   *bag = &obj->oo_dir->od_container;
04880 
04881         if (!dt_object_exists(dt))
04882                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOENT);
04883 
04884         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(it);
04885         if (it == NULL)
04886                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
04887 
04888         ipd = osd_it_ipd_get(env, bag);
04889         if (likely(ipd != NULL)) {
04890                 it->oi_obj = obj;
04891                 it->oi_ipd = ipd;
04892                 lu_object_get(lo);
04893                 iam_it_init(&it->oi_it, bag, IAM_IT_MOVE, ipd);
04894                 return (struct dt_it *)it;
04895         } else {
04896                 OBD_FREE_PTR(it);
04897                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
04898         }
04899 }
04900 
04905 static void osd_it_iam_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_it *di)
04906 {
04907         struct osd_it_iam       *it  = (struct osd_it_iam *)di;
04908         struct osd_object       *obj = it->oi_obj;
04909 
04910         iam_it_fini(&it->oi_it);
04911         osd_ipd_put(env, &obj->oo_dir->od_container, it->oi_ipd);
04912         lu_object_put(env, &obj->oo_dt.do_lu);
04913         OBD_FREE_PTR(it);
04914 }
04915 
04927 static int osd_it_iam_get(const struct lu_env *env,
04928                           struct dt_it *di, const struct dt_key *key)
04929 {
04930         struct osd_thread_info  *oti = osd_oti_get(env);
04931         struct osd_it_iam       *it = (struct osd_it_iam *)di;
04932 
04933         if (fid_is_quota(lu_object_fid(&it->oi_obj->oo_dt.do_lu))) {
04934                 /* swab quota uid/gid */
04935                 oti->oti_quota_id = cpu_to_le64(*((__u64 *)key));
04936                 key = (struct dt_key *)&oti->oti_quota_id;
04937         }
04938 
04939         return iam_it_get(&it->oi_it, (const struct iam_key *)key);
04940 }
04941 
04947 static void osd_it_iam_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_it *di)
04948 {
04949         struct osd_it_iam *it = (struct osd_it_iam *)di;
04950 
04951         iam_it_put(&it->oi_it);
04952 }
04953 
04964 static int osd_it_iam_next(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_it *di)
04965 {
04966         struct osd_it_iam *it = (struct osd_it_iam *)di;
04967 
04968         return iam_it_next(&it->oi_it);
04969 }
04970 
04975 static struct dt_key *osd_it_iam_key(const struct lu_env *env,
04976                                  const struct dt_it *di)
04977 {
04978         struct osd_thread_info *oti = osd_oti_get(env);
04979         struct osd_it_iam      *it = (struct osd_it_iam *)di;
04980         struct osd_object      *obj = it->oi_obj;
04981         struct dt_key          *key;
04982 
04983         key = (struct dt_key *)iam_it_key_get(&it->oi_it);
04984 
04985         if (!IS_ERR(key) && fid_is_quota(lu_object_fid(&obj->oo_dt.do_lu))) {
04986                 /* swab quota uid/gid */
04987                 oti->oti_quota_id = le64_to_cpu(*((__u64 *)key));
04988                 key = (struct dt_key *)&oti->oti_quota_id;
04989         }
04990 
04991         return key;
04992 }
04993 
04998 static int osd_it_iam_key_size(const struct lu_env *env, const struct dt_it *di)
04999 {
05000         struct osd_it_iam *it = (struct osd_it_iam *)di;
05001 
05002         return iam_it_key_size(&it->oi_it);
05003 }
05004 
05005 static inline void
05006 osd_it_append_attrs(struct lu_dirent *ent, int len, __u16 type)
05007 {
05008         /* check if file type is required */
05009         if (ent->lde_attrs & LUDA_TYPE) {
05010                 struct luda_type *lt;
05011                 int align = sizeof(*lt) - 1;
05012 
05013                 len = (len + align) & ~align;
05014                 lt = (struct luda_type *)(ent->lde_name + len);
05015                 lt->lt_type = cpu_to_le16(DTTOIF(type));
05016         }
05017 
05018         ent->lde_attrs = cpu_to_le32(ent->lde_attrs);
05019 }
05020 
05025 static inline void
05026 osd_it_pack_dirent(struct lu_dirent *ent, struct lu_fid *fid, __u64 offset,
05027                    char *name, __u16 namelen, __u16 type, __u32 attr)
05028 {
05029         ent->lde_attrs = attr | LUDA_FID;
05030         fid_cpu_to_le(&ent->lde_fid, fid);
05031 
05032         ent->lde_hash = cpu_to_le64(offset);
05033         ent->lde_reclen = cpu_to_le16(lu_dirent_calc_size(namelen, attr));
05034 
05035         strncpy(ent->lde_name, name, namelen);
05036         ent->lde_name[namelen] = '\0';
05037         ent->lde_namelen = cpu_to_le16(namelen);
05038 
05039         /* append lustre attributes */
05040         osd_it_append_attrs(ent, namelen, type);
05041 }
05042 
05046 static int osd_it_iam_rec(const struct lu_env *env,
05047                           const struct dt_it *di,
05048                           struct dt_rec *dtrec, __u32 attr)
05049 {
05050         struct osd_it_iam      *it   = (struct osd_it_iam *)di;
05051         struct osd_thread_info *info = osd_oti_get(env);
05052         ENTRY;
05053 
05054         if (S_ISDIR(it->oi_obj->oo_inode->i_mode)) {
05055                 const struct osd_fid_pack *rec;
05056                 struct lu_fid             *fid = &info->oti_fid;
05057                 struct lu_dirent          *lde = (struct lu_dirent *)dtrec;
05058                 char                      *name;
05059                 int                        namelen;
05060                 __u64                      hash;
05061                 int                        rc;
05062 
05063                 name = (char *)iam_it_key_get(&it->oi_it);
05064                 if (IS_ERR(name))
05065                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(name));
05066 
05067                 namelen = iam_it_key_size(&it->oi_it);
05068 
05069                 rec = (const struct osd_fid_pack *)iam_it_rec_get(&it->oi_it);
05070                 if (IS_ERR(rec))
05071                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(rec));
05072 
05073                 rc = osd_fid_unpack(fid, rec);
05074                 if (rc)
05075                         RETURN(rc);
05076 
05077                 hash = iam_it_store(&it->oi_it);
05078 
05079                 /* IAM does not store object type in IAM index (dir) */
05080                 osd_it_pack_dirent(lde, fid, hash, name, namelen,
05081                                    0, LUDA_FID);
05082         } else if (fid_is_quota(lu_object_fid(&it->oi_obj->oo_dt.do_lu))) {
05083                 iam_reccpy(&it->oi_it.ii_path.ip_leaf,
05084                            (struct iam_rec *)dtrec);
05085                 osd_quota_unpack(it->oi_obj, dtrec);
05086         } else {
05087                 iam_reccpy(&it->oi_it.ii_path.ip_leaf,
05088                            (struct iam_rec *)dtrec);
05089         }
05090 
05091         RETURN(0);
05092 }
05093 
05097 static __u64 osd_it_iam_store(const struct lu_env *env, const struct dt_it *di)
05098 {
05099         struct osd_it_iam *it = (struct osd_it_iam *)di;
05100 
05101         return iam_it_store(&it->oi_it);
05102 }
05103 
05115 static int osd_it_iam_load(const struct lu_env *env,
05116                            const struct dt_it *di, __u64 hash)
05117 {
05118         struct osd_it_iam *it = (struct osd_it_iam *)di;
05119 
05120         return iam_it_load(&it->oi_it, hash);
05121 }

05123 static const struct dt_index_operations osd_index_iam_ops = {
05124         .dio_lookup         = osd_index_iam_lookup,
05125         .dio_declare_insert = osd_index_declare_iam_insert,
05126         .dio_insert         = osd_index_iam_insert,
05127         .dio_declare_delete = osd_index_declare_iam_delete,
05128         .dio_delete         = osd_index_iam_delete,
05129         .dio_it     = {
05130                 .init     = osd_it_iam_init,
05131                 .fini     = osd_it_iam_fini,
05132                 .get      = osd_it_iam_get,
05133                 .put      = osd_it_iam_put,
05134                 .next     = osd_it_iam_next,
05135                 .key      = osd_it_iam_key,
05136                 .key_size = osd_it_iam_key_size,
05137                 .rec      = osd_it_iam_rec,
05138                 .store    = osd_it_iam_store,
05139                 .load     = osd_it_iam_load
05140         }
05141 };
